website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for an inexpensive metal swing set with a mid-sized footprint and a decent number of components, this one is worth considering.
pros: Great for climbers, as it has a monkey bar and rugged ladder
Includes a swing and a glider
We love the sunshade that provides UV protection for youngsters when they play on bright, sunny days
Affordable, and doesn't take up an extreme amount of space
cons: Some sets arrived with missing hardware
A few reports of some of the pre-drilled holes not lining up correctly

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price, in size and quality. My 6 year old loves it.. but she’s pretty small. Edit: canopy only lasted about 6 months before the rain and wind tore it in half and the sun faded it to white.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanyforever

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: For $200 what can you really expect? My 5yo loves it, it should last her a few years, that's all we need. There was one wrong piece in the box, but the company was very easy to work with and sent me a replacement. After that, assembly was not at all difficult (one adult, occasional "help" from 5yo). The instructions are not super descriptive, but combined with the pictures it's fine. We like that it's a little different from many sets, with the ladder instead of slide, and bar instead of another swing. Kiddo is thrilled that I can put a board across two ladder steps to make her a "table."
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Heusser

customer_reviews.title: Kid approved, 5 and 8 years old.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made but product came banged. It is already rusting where the pipes were scratched up on about 5 different places. It was from the manufacturer since they were all wrapped up very well with the damaged pipe inside. My kids give it 5 stars. They play the floor is lava on it. It is really cute without spending a ton of $.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Caudill

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: My husband assembled this today took approximately 3 hours by himself. Our 3 year old loves it. It seems to be sturdy and good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Reibel

customer_reviews.title: The swing set is nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Put it together by myself except to lift it up onto all 6 legs. I can see how some have difficulty figuring out the directions. The swing set is nice and sturdy. I do see a slight problem with the swing seat. It is plastic and slippery. All that matters is my 5 year old grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Madzelan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome swingset.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old and 3 year old granddaughters love this swing and they actually play together on it. The ground stakes make it very secure and I know I don't have to worry about setting it in concrete. The colors are vivid and make it a great visual attraction in my son's yard. It is study and looks like it will lay for years in the Colorado weather.
customer_reviews.author: Rozars Justice Novels, Angie Yturbe-Rozar

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but not safe to use.
customer_reviews.text: Not safe and very in stable. Sent back for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: JERO

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Super fun swing set for a busy 4yr old. Only complaint is the canopy holds water which is easy enough to get off but after a while the frame holding the canopy up (tension rod) split and the canopy had to come down. So blah on a non lasting canopy structure but it worked great for a while. Assembly is much easier with this one vs an older model we had so my hubby was happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: A perfect playground swing
customer_reviews.text: A perfect playground swing. Easy to assemble. Kids love it. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: chloe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Really sturdy a perfect gift for my 5 year old
customer_reviews.author: Mark Cologne

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy swingset.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. It was relatively easy to construct and it fits nicely in our small back yard. The canopy cover is a major plus as it keeps my daughter out of the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set!!!! Only downside was plastic swing but it does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Tropical E

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to age rating
customer_reviews.text: It is good for the age rating. Only issue is side to side sway. The climbing side is straight the no side angle to sturdy it up. Keep the older kids away from it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the kids, they cannot get enough of it overall 5 stars, it just took longer to assemble that the instructions state.
customer_reviews.author: Vaneesh K.

customer_reviews.title: This was a perfect pick for my very active 4 and 5 year ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect pick for my very active 4 and 5 year old. It's very sturdy and will last a while. I also think is better looking than most metal swiing sets. it took me about 3 or 4 hours to put together on my own. It would've gone much faster if I had had a helper above the age of 5. I don't use the shade- it's hard to get off and on and is generally useless.
customer_reviews.author: amazonmom

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy enough and a great size for our small backyard. My 2, 6 and 8 yr old boys love getting energy out on it. We did buy the extra anchor set which helped it feel more grounded. Good price IMO!
customer_reviews.author: amberdavies

customer_reviews.title: but very satisfied with it
customer_reviews.text: A little effort needed to put it together, but very satisfied with it. A few bolts were missing and the company has them on the way. If you have a climber, they will love this set!
customer_reviews.author: S. Cordwell

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Step 1, predrilled holes do not line up. Step 2, refer to Step 1
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Tingdale

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the kids happy. Looks well made enough
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Keeps the kids happy. Looks well made enough. You will need to purchase additional anchors as the ones provided will not hold the set in place.
customer_reviews.author: sunny

customer_reviews.title: swing set can be assembled at home with help of a friend for free
customer_reviews.text: called Home adviser...got quote of $600 to assemble this swing set. used to give two kids something to play on over the summer vacation.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Great value and kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly; most of it completed by myself but needed 2nd set of hands for about 10 mins. Kids and dogs love it!
customer_reviews.author: E. Blunt

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: is not as sturdy as I would like but like the climbing bars
customer_reviews.author: LindaKuyper

customer_reviews.title: A Strong Playset
customer_reviews.text: A Strong, Sturdy Playset, Very happy with the product :)
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this. Easy to put together and fun to play on.
customer_reviews.author: S.Grass

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The flexible wooden sticks to hold the canopy broke within the 1st week of assembly. Some of the assembly items do not line up properly with the holes to secure the fastners.
customer_reviews.author: umesh asrani

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with this product! I was hesitant because of the mixed reviews! For one, my husband was able to put it together by himself (maybe some assistance from out 7 year old) and I did not even know he was doing it. It took maybe an hour and a half and my husband doesn't do a lot of putting things together. Also, I have a very tall and muscular 7 year old. He is about 85 pounds and I was worried it would not be sturdy enough for him. He has been roughing it up and even had a friend come by and they are rocking and swinging away with no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Ni HS

customer_reviews.title: Cheap China Crap!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most horrid piece of junk I ever bought. The ladder part was not drilled properly and it threw the whole ladder crooked. The holes for the screws was off so they had to be adjusted with a drill . The see saw rider goes crooked when it is ridden. And finally the tie downs are the most ridiculous things I ever seen. They hold nothing down. Now I have to go buy something that actually works. Why do we import cheap junk from China then pay high prices for the crap. It never works like it is suppose to.
customer_reviews.author: Blubird

customer_reviews.title: Could be a great swingset.
customer_reviews.text: Could be a great swingset. . . The swing seat is very hard plastic, and my daughter finds it uncomfortable, the munkey hanging bar is way too high for any kid under 7 or 8 years, and one of the climbing rungs can't fit on due to the bars pozition. . . when I ordered this I expected all hardware to be included *as said on amazon* however: I was missing 12 nuts and bolts. . . I honestly don't see this set lasting long: should of ordered one with a slide at least. . .
customer_reviews.author: Jess Kremidas.co

customer_reviews.title: If your gonna move your not taking it with you
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I put one up 30 years ago and we used concrete poured into holes and it is still standing thru 2 tornadoes. We plan on doing the same with our grand girl! A little concrete a leveler BOOM safe forever.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: good for the money
customer_reviews.text: My grandson just turned 3 and is enjoying this so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this set for our 7 year old daughter. I like that this set is built for older children. It is very sturdy and aesthetically pleasing. This set is also a great value at a little under $200.00. I see us being outside every day playing with this!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Janning

product_meta.title: Ironkids Challenge 100 Metal Swing Set with Ladder Climber and UV Protective Sunshade
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
What is an IRONKID? An IRONKID is a youth who is inspired and motivated through sport to lead an active, positive and healthy lifestyle. Started in 1985, thousands of kids from ages 7 to 15 compete in the IRONKIDS Triathlon Series (swimming, running and biking) races throughout the United States. The IRONKIDS Triathlon Series promotes friendly competition where "Every Finisher is a Winner". The IRONKIDS Inspiration 100 features 4 activities that will keep 5 kids busy at the same time. You benefit from knowing the kids are secure and safe in your own backyard. Features and Specifications: Built in UV sun protection Covered swing chains Safety Mesh included Set-Up Dimensions: 10.4ft W x 6 ft. H x 6ft D Set-Up Weight: 85 lbs. Monkey Bar height: 58'' Seat Height (swing): 16'' Seat Height (glider seat): 24'' Made in China What's Included: 1 Swing Two Passenger Glider Seat Monkey Bar Ladder Climb UV Protective Sunshade. Assembly: Assembly manual included Assembly Time: Approximately 1-2 hours (2 people) Ground Stakes: Included (corkscrew design). Safety Information: Maximum Weight Capacity: 600 lbs. Swing Weight Capacity: 100 lbs. Glider Seat Weight Capacity: 100 lbs. per seat. Tools Needed (Not included): Allen Wrench. Warranty: The IRONKIDS Inspiration 100 comes with a "Limited Lifetime Warranty" on the frame (See Owner's Manual for further details) and 6 months coverage on all other components.
feature_bullets: Swinging burns calories and engages muscle groups, particularly hamstrings and quadriceps
Monkey Bar -Builds arm strength and helps keep off excess weight through exercise; Also the arms, shoulders and chest will strengthen as well
Ladder Climb -Helps grow a kid's sense of balance and co-ordination; Climbing on bars strengthens both arm and leg muscles and builds confidence
UV Protective Sunshade - Adds a beautiful appearance and provides some shade when kids are on the swings or Monkey Bar

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars93 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
